text: update ordinfo set xgsj=current_timestamp,ProductionRelease=current_timestamp,ExFactory=date_add(current_date, interval 15 day ) where (bh={{form_order_detail.sourceData.bh}});update ordinfo d join ztdm z on d.bh={{form_order_detail.sourceData.bh}} and z.bh=5 set d.zt = z.bh,d.ztmc=z.mc where d.zt in (1,2);update ordinfo d join ztdm z on d.bh={{form_order_detail.sourceData.bh}} and z.bh=8 set d.zt = z.bh,d.ztmc=z.mc where d.zt in (1,2,5) and ColorWay="SUB";update ordinfo set ExFactory=date_add(current_date, interval 20 day ) where (bh={{form_order_detail.sourceData.bh}}) and  imno like "AUR%";update ordinfo set ExFactory=date_add(current_date, interval 20 day ) where (bh={{form_order_detail.sourceData.bh}}) and  imno like "AUD%";update ordinfo set ExFactory=date_add(current_date, interval 20 day ) where (bh={{form_order_detail.sourceData.bh}}) and  imno like "AUSC%";UPDATE ordinfo SET Est_Exfactory=date_sub(delivery, INTERVAL 8 day),stage1= date_sub(delivery, INTERVAL 28 day),stage2= date_add(ProductionRelease, INTERVAL 7 day),stage3= date_add(ProductionRelease, INTERVAL 12 day),stage4= date_add(ProductionRelease, INTERVAL 14 day) WHERE (bh={{form_order_detail.sourceData.bh}}) ;
